metadata.name: PLEASURE TIME
metadata.description:
While taking pictures in İzmir's Ödemiş district, I went to an authentic village coffee house to relax and drink tea, and as soon as I walked through the door, I felt like I had entered an old movie set from the 1950s. When I saw the man with the hat sitting at the table directly opposite the door and the authenticity of the environment, I had different feelings. It was a great environment with the smoke coming out of his cigarette, the music playing in the background and everything. Before I drank my tea, with my camera ready, I took a few photos without missing this moment.

This photo won the first prize in Artukbey's "Coffee from Your Frame" photography contest in 2018.
 
Artis: Hasan UÇAR Edition: 1/1
Camera: Nikon D610
Date: 2018
File: jpeg 300 dpi
Location: İzmir / Türkiye
Image Size: 4724 x 3374
